Package org.odpi.openmetadata.accessservices.digitalarchitecture.server

Class DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.multitenant.OMAGServerServiceInstance
org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.multitenant.AuditableServerServiceInstance
org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.multitenant.OMASServiceInstance
org.odpi.openmetadata.accessservices.digitalarchitecture.server.DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance
public class DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance extends OMASServiceInstance
DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance caches references to the runtime objects for a specific server. It is also responsible for registering itself in the instance map.

  • Constructor Details

    • DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance

      public DigitalArchitectureServicesInstance(OMRSRepositoryConnector repositoryConnector, List<String> supportedZones, List<String> defaultZones, List<String> publishZones, AuditLog auditLog, String localServerUserId, int maxPageSize) throws NewInstanceException
      Set up the handlers for this server.
      Parameters:
      repositoryConnector - link to the repository responsible for servicing the REST calls.
      supportedZones - list of zones that DigitalArchitecture is allowed to serve Assets from.
      auditLog - destination for audit log events.
      defaultZones - list of zones that Digital Architecture sets up in new Asset instances.
      publishZones - list of zones that Digital Architecture sets up in published Asset instances.
      localServerUserId - userId used for server initiated actions
      maxPageSize - maximum number of results that can be returned on a single call
      Throws:
      NewInstanceException - a problem occurred during initialization

      public ReferenceableHandler<ElementHeader> getReferenceableHandler() throws PropertyServerException
      Return the handler for managing events.
      Returns:
      handler object
      Throws:
      PropertyServerException - the instance has not been initialized successfully
